prompts: Create a small, furry Pokemon known for its speed and quick movements.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a brown, sleek body and sharp teeth, perfect for battles.
Design a Pokemon resembling a large rodent with a powerful bite and agile nature.
Generate a creature that thrives in urban areas, often seen scurrying around for food.
Show me a Pokemon with a round body, small ears, and a mischievous grin.
Give me a depiction of a Pokemon that can evolve and becomes more formidable over time.
Make a Pokemon that symbolizes adaptability and survival in various environments.
